creator: simon.litwan@wyona.com
text:
it is possible to use ' in the Document ID. but after create it gives a
premature end of file.

Yesterday I fixed bug 37517, so special characters are not allowed anymore. Did
you update your SVN today? If the problem disappears after updating, we can mark
this bug as a duplicate of 37517.
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 37517 ***
